title: Pause the Apex Motors campaign due to...

messages.content: Pause the Apex Motors campaign due to budget review

âœ… **Campaign Paused Successfully**

The Apex Motors campaign (mb_apex_motors_q1) has been paused for budget review.

**Status Change:**
- Previous: Active
- Current: **Paused**

**Impact:**
- All ad delivery has been stopped
- No further spend will occur until the campaign is resumed

**Notifications:**
- Slack notification sent to #adcp-demo
- Email draft generated and sent to jasonliew@signal42.ai

The campaign will remain paused until you're ready to resume it after completing your budget review. Just let me know when you'd like to reactivate it!
